titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller family papers, Sound and Video Recordings
A Guide to the Rockefeller family papers, Sound and Video Recordings FA1787

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-10-01 04:56:42 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller family papers, Sound and Video Recordings

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Audio and video recordings.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Rockefeller Archive Center recognizes that our audiovisual materials may contain problematic language and/or content.

The films, videos, and/or sound in this collection have not been altered in any way. All titles and/or content are illustrative of the creator's original vision. As such, this audiovisual collection may contain discriminatory visual and/or aural content that is representative of racial, gendered, or ableist biases.

Accompanying description, most often with creator or donor-generated language and terminology, has to this point been retained and maintained "as received" by RAC with minimal archivist intervention or augmentation.
We acknowledge these problems and aim to cultivate inclusive representation and equity by reconsidering and enhancing our description of this audiovisual material with current sensibilities.

did.unittitle: Nelson Rockefeller - Memorial Service, Riverside Church - Conclusion of Funeral from ABC-TV Broadcast

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Digital access copy available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Original tape annotation:"Recorded at RAC" - Production B. Tape contains TV broadcast conclusion of Nelson A. Rockefeller's funeral, includes commentators remarks.

did.unittitle: Nelson Rockefeller - Memorial Service, Riverside Church - Outside Riverside Church and Arrivals

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Digital access copy available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Original tape annotation: "Only in front of church." Tape contains exterior footage from in front of Riverside Church as funeral attendees arrive. Footage of Happy Rockefeller and children.

did.unittitle: Nelson Rockefeller - Memorial Service, Riverside Church - Beginning of Funeral

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Digital access copy available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Original tape annotation: "Unedited tape" - Tape supplied by ABC Television. Contains exterior footage of attendees arriving at Riverside Church, exterior shots of the church, President Jimmy Carter and First Lady Rosalind Carter, choir entrance, and the first part of the funeral service: Speakers include David Rockefeller and Henry Kissinger.

did.unittitle: Nelson Rockefeller - Memorial Service, Riverside Church - Conclusion of Funeral.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Digital access copy available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Original tape annotation: "Unedited FILM" - Tape supplied by ABC Television. Tape contains conclusion of funeral, including conclusion of Henry Kissinger's remarks, exiting of the guests to the tune "Sweet Georgia Brown," and exterior sidewalk shots of guests leaving funeral.

did.unittitle: MacNeil/Lehrer Special Edition: "Carter Energy Plan" - John D. Rockefeller IV appearance - Part 1

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Digital access copy available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: News discussion around President Jimmy Carter's attempt at a comprehensive national energy program. Also appearing: Michael Dukakis, Governor of Massachusetts; Richard Lamb, Governor of Colorado; Edwin Edwards, Governor of Louisiana; James Thompson, Governor of Illinois; Jay Rockefeller, Governor of West Virginia. WNET Channel 13
